Title: Enacts the consumer wheelchair repair bill of rights act
Summary: Enacts the "consumer wheelchair repair bill of rights act" requiring  manufacturers to  make available  certain  documentation,  parts, embedded  software, firmware,  or tools necessary  for repairing  equipment.
LawCode: Ren Art 32 ยง670 to be Art 32-A ยง676, add ยง677, Gen Bus L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to enacting the "consumer wheelchair repair bill of rights act"
